sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Set threshold type for pre-Utah NLU mode</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var modelGr = new GlideRecord('sys_nlu_model'); modelGr.addNullQuery('threshold_type'); modelGr.addQuery('oob', false); modelGr.setValue('threshold_type', 'automatic'); modelGr.updateMultiple(); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-27 06:44:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4323f673c7061110c59d3d9c95c260a7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set threshold type for pre-Utah NLU mode</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4323f673c7061110c59d3d9c95c260a7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-27 09:23:12</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set threshold type for pre-Utah NLU mode
